content:
In the Kharkiv direction, the border guards showed effective night work, which made the seven invaders "three hundred".

About thisinformsState Border Service of Ukraine.

"While working in the Kharkiv direction, the fighters of the Guard Brigade of the offensive" steel border "with discharges from shock UAVs inflicted fire damage to the personnel and positions of the enemy," - said in the department.

As it is noted, the result of the work - seven invaders suffered serious injuries.

"No occupier will walk on Ukrainian land," the border guards emphasized.

As reported by the Armyinform, Defense ForcesStruckenemy command-observation point.
title: Defense forces showed how seven occupiers became incapacitated from their blows
description: The State Border Service of Ukraine informs about it. “While working on Kharkiv ...
author: Army Inform
